meanings.definition: One of a series of rows or levels placed one above the other.
meanings.sent1: The cake had a top tier decorated with flowers.
meanings.sent2: The wedding cake had multiple tiers, each with a different flavor.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to climb the tier of shelves but got stuck halfway.
meanings.sent4: As she climbed the corporate ladder, each promotion felt like reaching a new tier of success.
meanings.sent5: The waterfall cascaded down the tier of rocks, creating a mesmerizing sight.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is ranked or graded within a system.
meanings.sent1: She was considered a top-tier student due to her exceptional grades.
meanings.sent2: In the army, he quickly rose through the ranks to become a high-tier officer.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the top-tier prize was fierce among the participants.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was in a tier of its own, standing out among the rest.
meanings.sent5: The elite club only accepted members who were part of the highest tier of society.
